title: Happy Halloween
updateMessage: Major update with new features, themes, and fixes!
newFeatures: Added Halloween theme (available for 30 days, default theme)
Added Forms & Feedback page in the pop-up for suggestions, bug reports, and feedback
Added new friend status indicator for deleted friends
Implemented timeout system for inactive pages
One-page system: only one active page open per type (Settings, Privacy Policy, Terms of Service)
Added warning on Welcome page if your extension version is outdated
uiImprovements: Updated extension icon for better appearance
Improved loading speed for friends list
bugFixes: Fixed bug that added extra text in pop-up
Fixed display name showing as 'user_ID' instead of display name
Fixed extension showing blocked users and mutual/trusted/new badges incorrectly
securityUpdates: Removed all webhook systems and related features
removedFeatures: Removed allow game joined via status setting
Removed block users after unfriended setting
Removed mutual, new, and trusted badges
Removed bug report system from pop-up
knownBugs: Account age not working (will be fixed next update)
Language not applying to all elements (work in progress)
Status may show as black (work in progress)
Friend status may not update after refreshing pop-up
Extension currently allows use on two Roblox pages with different accounts; working on a fix
otherChanges: Minor text corrections and UI improvements
developerNotes: Working on enhancements for language application
